offers.title: Hetzner Cloud: Unleash Your Projects with Free Credits
offers.description: Power up your cloud hosting with €20 free credits! Enjoy reliable, scalable servers to bring your ideas to life without breaking the bank.

offers.title: Windsurf IDE: Code Smarter with 500 Free Credits
offers.description: Supercharge your development workflow with Windsurf IDE. Get 500 free credits to explore cutting-edge tools and streamline your coding projects.

offers.title: EmailOctopus: Reach More with 10,000 Free Emails
offers.description: Grow your audience effortlessly with EmailOctopus. Send up to 10,000 emails per month for free and connect with your subscribers like never before.
